title: Cyanide & Happiness - S1 Bonus: Weed Run
description:
When we released Beer Run a few years ago, a bunch of YouTube comments (the ones that weren't quoting the punchline) told us we should do one about weed.

Well, one cool thing about Flash is the animation is modular, and made up of reused symbols.

It took like half an hour to swap out the beer bottles for bongs and create a new version of the short.

Behold, Weed Run.

Read more at http://www.explosm.net/show/episode/58/bonus-weed-run#5eulIARsyweUZEfQ.99
